page.title: 07About Ponteland CARE Village
page.content: CARE has established a village near the Police Headquarters at Ponteland, Northumberland for mentally Handicapped people. Building began in 1983 & was completed during summer 1984,providing residential accommodation for 28 mentally handicapped adults (male & female) plus some staff; workshop facilities,small internal laundry, central kitchen,small office/ administration area & central "village hall" for recreation. First residents arrived in April 1984 there are now 27 residents (15 male & 12 female),6 residential care staff,3 senior residential staff plus families living on site together with 8 day staff who live locally and one residential volunteer. In the future 13 more handicapped people plus 4 staff will be housed.
